âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Markdown presentation with webcam integration â€¢ Slide creation using Markdown/MDX â€¢ Live presentation with screen sharing
ðŸ“– Summary: Zoetic is a JavaScript-based tool for creating and presenting slides using Markdown, with the unique feature of integrating a live webcam feed directly into the presentation. It allows users to create slides using Markdown or MDX, and then present them with their webcam feed overlaid, making it suitable for online meetings and remote presentations. Planned features include green screen support, multi-camera support, and virtual webcam functionality.
